channel.title: Heroes Rise - The Evolution of PvP
channel.description:
[center]Just started new PvP server Heroes Rise where you will fight in Arenas for rating and coins to upgrade your weapons. You will not have to look for opponents to fight, our server matchmaking will find you one. You will be able to fight in 1x1, 3x3, 5x5 and Dangerous Arenas.
[url=http://77.241.197.111/Heroes_Rise.rar]Download Heroes Rise[/url]
[url=http://77.241.197.111/forum]Heroes Rise Forum[/url]

[url=http://77.241.197.111/Heroes_Rise.rar]Download Heroes Rise[/url]
